Q. How do I pay for my service?

A. Direct debit is our preferred payment method; simple and safe. You will receive your direct debit mandate form in the post, once received simply complete and return in the envelope provided, please ensure this has been setup within 14 days of commencement of the service. Please note that direct debit is mandatory if receiving a teatime pack.

If you have any questions regarding payment, please contact apetito on 02392 730394.

For any other enquiries please contact the Independence & Wellbeing Team on 02392 688390.
